name: Project Code: Dark (Demo)
description:
DISCLAIMER 

The current version you are about to play is a demo. By this, we mean that new features will be added as the development continues. This is a 10-minute tech demo, we're looking forward to get feedback from the mechanics developed so far, the art style, environment interaction, etc.

Project Code: Dark DEMO  About the game

Project Code: Dark is a psychological horror game where you have to escape from the Creations, monsters created by Marcus' imagination. Be aware of the environment and try not to die in the process. You are on your own, but not alone.

Story

During Marcus' life, he's been through a lot. Exemplary father,  good husband, but since 2002 he's not the same.

A horrible accident turned him into a prisoned man inside a mental health hospital, where painful treatment is used to control people like Marcus. This treatment was some kind of gas that made them go even crazier.

During that therapy, Marcus dreams about things about his past, things that affected him and now they're turning real. 

Note: As we said, this is a demo, so expect running into bugs, crashes and poor optimization.  Some of the models aren't finished yet, that's why you may see yellow boxes around.

Also, don't forget to check our Linktr!
